${ModID}:MissileStrike.NAME: Missile Strike
${ModID}:MissileStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:MagicDart.NAME: Magic Dart
${ModID}:MagicDart.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your hand size.
${ModID}:MagicDart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal damage equal to your hand size.

${ModID}:Cull.NAME: Cull
${ModID}:Cull.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL EVERYONE loses !M! HP.

${ModID}:Potential.NAME: Potential
${ModID}:Potential.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! card. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Potential.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Aura.NAME: Aura
${ModID}:Aura.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose HP.

${ModID}:Flow.NAME: Flow
${ModID}:Flow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the last card played this turn was an Attack, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:Manaburst.NAME: Manaburst
${ModID}:Manaburst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random 0-cost Attack from your discard pile to your hand.
${ModID}:Manaburst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! random 0-cost Attacks from your discard pile to your hand.

${ModID}:IchorGoblet.NAME: Ichor Goblet
${ModID}:IchorGoblet.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] at the start of next !M! turns. If you lose HP, gain it all immediately.
